calcal 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Work with Islamic dates

Source: R/islamic.R
islamic.Rd

Work with Islamic dates

Usage

cal_islamic

islamic_date(year = integer(), month = integer(), day = integer())

as_islamic(date)

Format

An object of class calcal of length 8.

Arguments

year

A numeric vector of years

month

A numeric vector of months

day

A numeric vector of days

date

Vector of dates on some calendar

Value

An islamic vector object

Examples

as_date("2016-01-01", calendar = cal_islamic)
#> <Islamic[1]>
#> [1] 1437-Rab1-20
as_date(Sys.Date(), calendar = cal_islamic)
#> <Islamic[1]>
#> [1] 1446-Dhu'l_H-10
tibble::tibble(
  x = new_date(year = 2025, month = 5, day = 1:31, calendar = cal_gregorian),
  y = as_date(x, calendar = cal_islamic)
)
#> # A tibble: 31 × 2
#>              x               y
#>          <Gre>           <Hij>
#>  1 2025-May-01 1446-Dhu'l_Q-03
#>  2 2025-May-02 1446-Dhu'l_Q-04
#>  3 2025-May-03 1446-Dhu'l_Q-05
#>  4 2025-May-04 1446-Dhu'l_Q-06
#>  5 2025-May-05 1446-Dhu'l_Q-07
#>  6 2025-May-06 1446-Dhu'l_Q-08
#>  7 2025-May-07 1446-Dhu'l_Q-09
#>  8 2025-May-08 1446-Dhu'l_Q-10
#>  9 2025-May-09 1446-Dhu'l_Q-11
#> 10 2025-May-10 1446-Dhu'l_Q-12
#> # ℹ 21 more rows
new_date(year = 2025, month = 4, day = 19:30, calendar = cal_islamic)
#> <Islamic[12]>
#>  [1] 2025-Rab2-19 2025-Rab2-20 2025-Rab2-21 2025-Rab2-22 2025-Rab2-23
#>  [6] 2025-Rab2-24 2025-Rab2-25 2025-Rab2-26 2025-Rab2-27 2025-Rab2-28
#> [11] 2025-Rab2-29 2025-Jum1-01
islamic_date(2025, 4, 19:30)
#> <Islamic[12]>
#>  [1] 2025-Rab2-19 2025-Rab2-20 2025-Rab2-21 2025-Rab2-22 2025-Rab2-23
#>  [6] 2025-Rab2-24 2025-Rab2-25 2025-Rab2-26 2025-Rab2-27 2025-Rab2-28
#> [11] 2025-Rab2-29 2025-Jum1-01
as_islamic("2016-01-01")
#> <Islamic[1]>
#> [1] 1437-Rab1-20
as_islamic(Sys.Date())
#> <Islamic[1]>
#> [1] 1446-Dhu'l_H-10
tibble::tibble(
  x = seq(as.Date("2025-01-01"), as.Date("2025-12-31"), by = "day"),
  y = as_islamic(x)
)
#> # A tibble: 365 × 2
#>    x                    y
#>    <date>           <Hij>
#>  1 2025-01-01 1446-Raj-01
#>  2 2025-01-02 1446-Raj-02
#>  3 2025-01-03 1446-Raj-03
#>  4 2025-01-04 1446-Raj-04
#>  5 2025-01-05 1446-Raj-05
#>  6 2025-01-06 1446-Raj-06
#>  7 2025-01-07 1446-Raj-07
#>  8 2025-01-08 1446-Raj-08
#>  9 2025-01-09 1446-Raj-09
#> 10 2025-01-10 1446-Raj-10
#> # ℹ 355 more rows
